Uses of Package
com.stickycoding.Rokon.Handlers

Packages that use com.stickycoding.Rokon.Handlers
com.stickycoding.Rokon   
com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers   
 

Classes in com.stickycoding.Rokon.Handlers used by com.stickycoding.Rokon
AccelerometerHandler
          AccelerometerHandler allow you be notified of shakes and accelerometer changes
AnimationHandler
          AnimationHandler allows you to be notified at the end of each animation loop, or final loop
CollisionHandler
          CollisionHandler allows you to be alerted of very basic collisions
DynamicsHandler
          DynamicsHandler allows you to be notified when a Sprite reaches its terminal velocity
InputHandler
          InputHandler allows you to be notified of screen touches, and alerted when specific hotspots are touched
 

Classes in com.stickycoding.Rokon.Handlers used by com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers
BasicHandler
          The BasicHandler is a very simple handler, which is intended for SpriteModifiers to use in order to trigger events in the game thread
